start.text: By Ludd's will I shall be His sword!
I am Ludd's servant, and I shall enact His will!

start_boss.text: The servants of Moloch shall be banished today!
Return to your master, slaves of Moloch!
You shall meet with Ludd's judgement today!

retreat.text: Through Ludd's guidance I shall retreat today.
By the will of Ludd, I stay my hand.

out_of_missiles.text: All that remains now is Ludd's will!

need_help.text: Cherish the faithful, for the faithful are in danger!

pursuing.text: We shall cast these demons out!
Begone, demons, your kind has no hold here!

running.text: Ludd's will shall hold in all times...
By Ludd's grace, we shall return!

hull_90.text: We shall endure with our faith!

hull_50.text: By Ludd's will we shall hold!
Faith shall guide us through this day!

hull_30.text: By Ludd's will, we shall not fall!

overload.text: I will not fail this test of faith!

victory.text: Ludd has guided us to another victory!
By the will of Ludd, we have won!
By our faith have we achieved this victory!

reply.text: Your fire pales in comparison to Ludd's light, unbeliever.
Pride is a sin you best rid yourself of, unbeliever
Such words will not dissuade me.
I pray that Ludd give you the strength to survive this fight, unbeliever.
It seems only Ludd may be the only one who can help you here, unbeliever.
